name: Backrest
description: Backrest is a web-accessible backup solution built on top of restic. Provides a WebUI for easy backup management, scheduling, and restoration with support for multiple storage backends.
short_desc: Web-based backup solution with restic backend and automated scheduling.
author: garethgeorge

form_fields.label: Container > UserID (UID)
form_fields.hint: User ID for file permissions. Use 'id -u' command to find your user ID.

form_fields.label: Container > GroupID (PGID)
form_fields.hint: Group ID for file permissions. Use 'id -g' command to find your group ID.

form_fields.label: Backrest > Data Directory
form_fields.hint: Internal container path for application data. Keep default unless you have specific requirements.

form_fields.label: Backrest > Config File Path
form_fields.hint: Path to the configuration file inside the container. Keep default unless you have specific requirements.

form_fields.label: Backrest > Cache Directory
form_fields.hint: Directory for caching restic data. Helps improve backup performance.

form_fields.label: Backrest > Temporary Directory
form_fields.hint: Directory for temporary files during backup operations.

form_fields.label: Backrest > Restic Command Path
form_fields.hint: Custom path to restic binary. Leave empty to use Backrest's auto-managed restic version (recommended).

form_fields.label: System > Timezone
form_fields.hint: Timezone for scheduled backups and logs. Use format like 'America/New_York' or 'Europe/London'.
